Yeah, my husband's been away all week and the first thing that went
through my mind when I read that homeschooling moms dream about a
nice carpenter coming to the house had nothing at all to do with
bookcases. I mean, bookcases are nice too.

Sorcha

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: *Wasting your potential* was: perspective  for L...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 05/09/2003 10:39:13 AM Central Daylight Time, ... Yeah!  I ve always had a dream about a nice carpenter coming to my house and...oh.  You re
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 05/09/2003 10:39:13 AM Central Daylight Time,
ecsamhill@... writes:


> Pretty much every homeschooling mom I know dreams of having some nice
> carpenter come to her house and create built-in, floor-to-ceiling
> bookcases. (I want mine with that ladder that slides along the front. <g>)
>
> Betsy
>
>

Yeah! I've always had a dream about a nice carpenter coming to my house
and...oh. You're talking about building bookcases. My bad. <BWG>

Laura B.
